properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 24 at 4:04AM EST until January 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...East then southeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to
25 kt Friday evening into early Saturday morning, then south
15 to 20 kt, becoming southwest 10 to 15 kt Saturday morning
into early Saturday afternoon. Waves 3 to 4 ft expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek
VA and Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA
including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY
